meanings.sent1: The undernourishments in the village were evident from the children's pale faces.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended a balanced diet to combat undernourishments.
meanings.sent3: The undernourishments at the picnic were the lack of dessert options.
meanings.sent4: Her undernourishments of love left her feeling empty inside.
meanings.sent5: The undernourishments of creativity stifled the artist's inspiration.

meanings.sent1: Undernourishments can lead to various health issues.
meanings.sent2: The undernourishments in the region were a result of poor harvests.
meanings.sent3: The undernourishments of flavor in the dish made it taste bland.
meanings.sent4: His undernourishments of knowledge hindered his understanding of the subject.
meanings.sent5: The undernourishments of kindness in his actions were noticeable to everyone.

meanings.sent1: The undernourishments of the athlete affected their performance.
meanings.sent2: Undernourishments can be addressed through proper meal planning.
meanings.sent3: The undernourishments of laughter in the room made it feel somber.
meanings.sent4: Her undernourishments of confidence held her back from trying new things.
